title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 128.1 - Applicability of related rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 128.1 - Applicability of related rules

State Regulations

All work performed within the limits of a State highway
shall be subject to the same rules and regulations as those prescribed for
facilities occupying bridge structures, insofar as the rules and regulations
are applicable. The permittee shall obtain any necessary consents from the
owners of abutting property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
128.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
